protocol.name: Affymetrix:Protocol:Hybridization-EukGE-WS2v5
protocol.text: Title: Affymetrix in vitro transcription. Description:

protocol.name: P-G7003-1
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown in liquid culture, in 50 ml MS salts plus glucose in 250 ml flasks, 100 seeds per flask.  Flasks were shaken gently on a rotator under fluorescent lights (24 hour, 22 degrees).  Seeds were stratified at 4 degrees in water for 2 days prior to adding to culture medium.

protocol.name: P-G7003-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were mock treated with carrier alone (ethanol) to a final concentration of 0.1% ethanol for one hour before tissue was harvested and quick frozen.

protocol.name: P-G7003-4
protocol.text: RNA was isolated from 100 mg of tissue using a QIAGEN RNeasy plant miniprep kit.

protocol.name: P-G7003-5
protocol.text: Seedlings were mock treated with 0.1% ethanol for one hour before tissue was harvested and quick frozen.

protocol.name: P-G7003-6
protocol.text: Twenty micrograms biotinylated cRNA was prepared from the purified total RNA using standard Affymetrix protocols.

protocol.name: P-G7003-7
protocol.text: Seedlings were treated with dexamethasone in ethanol to a final concentration of 0.1% ethanol and 50 micrograms per ml dexamethasone for one hour before tissue was harvested and quick frozen.

protocol.name: P-G7003-8
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown in liquid culture, in 50 ml MS salts plus glucose in 250 ml flasks, 100 seeds per flask. Flasks were shaken gently on a rotator under fluorescent lights (24 hour, 22 degrees). Seeds were stratified at 4 degrees in water for 2 days prior to adding to culture medium.
